wikipedia_page.main: James Austin (born 5 April 1983 in Lichfield, England) is an English judoka. He competed at the 2012 Summer Olympics in the -100 kg event.  Since the 2012 Olympic Games he has won the 2012 World Cup in Minsk, the 2013 European Cup and the 2014 Scottish Open, as well as finishing in 3rd place in the 2013 Pan American Open.

response: * James Austin (born 1983) judoka, competed at the 2012 Summer Olympics
